name: Uniform Office Document
summary: Learn about .UOF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: While the UOF extension is a generic extension for the Uniform Office Format, there are also specific extensions for text documents (.UOT), presentations (.UOP), and spreadsheets (.UOS). The specific extensions are more commonly used than .uof.
NOTE: UOF can also stand for Unified Office Format.

description: Document created in the Uniform Office Format (UOF), a file format developed for Chinese office productivity applications; uses XML formatting and compresses all document contents in a file container with the .uof extension.
